text: Is there a better layout language than HTML for printing?
I'm using Python and Qt 4.4 and I have to print some pages.
Initially I thought I'd use HTML with CSS to produce those pages.
Now the question is: is there anything that's better than HTML but just (or almost) as easy to use?
kdgregory & Mark G: The most obvious limitation is that I can't specify the printer margins.
There is another problem: How do I add page numbers?
Jeremy French: One thing I have to print is a list of all the products someone ordered which can spread over a few pages.
